body_html:
Thanks @aselle !

Here's some bits I found that may help (I hope I'm not totally off here):

  1. This sprite builder here, line [16]. I still need to figure out how to build it straight from the source images (after resizing them) and not from a tensor already containing the images as used there.

  2. Similarly, generating the metadata file, like here, line [69]

  3. To refine the question - should the sprite and metadata files be built continuously with every step in the training, or can they be prepared in advance?

Thanks again!

body:
Thanks @aselle !

Here's some bits I found that may help (I hope I'm not totally off here):

1. This sprite builder [here](https://github.com/oduerr/dl_tutorial/blob/master/tensorflow/debugging/embedding.ipynb), line [16]. I still need to figure out how to build it straight from the source images (after resizing them) and not from a tensor already containing the images as used there.

2. Similarly, generating the metadata file, like [here](https://github.com/normanheckscher/mnist-tensorboard-embeddings/blob/master/mnist_t-sne.py), line [69]

3. To refine the question - should the sprite and metadata files be built continuously with every step in the training, or can they be prepared in advance?

Thanks again!
